text:
Hi Johnny hope work is going well! I’m sorry again, I’m away for a little bit but I’m back next weekend and I’ll have access to my computer then to get your advice on a piece I was working on! It’s a little environment based on the book of Kells, dunno if you’ve heard about it? 
Anyway just wanted to hop in and say a quick hello, and apologies for not having much to show you over the past while! Take care!

Good morning !! No worries .
Send me some screen grabs when you get a change
